body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us today. My name is David Lewis and I'm with ABC Car Dealership. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello David, my name is Jessica Davis.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Jessica. Could you please provide me with your phone number, including the area code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, eight three zero, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Jessica. And may I also have your email address, spelled out letter by letter?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is J E S S I C A D A V I S at gmail dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information, Jessica. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm just feeling sad about the data management issue I'm experiencing.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Jessica. We will do our best to help you resolve this. Thank you for reaching out and sharing your concerns.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Jessica. Have a great day.
